bibl.title: Regum Externorum Consuetudine: The Nature and Function of Embalming in Rome.
bibl.note: Late-Republican xenophobia. - Embalming in Rome: evidence and context. - The re-evaluation of Egypt and the Hellenistic East after Actium. - Status. - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: COUNTS Derek B., Regum Externorum Consuetudine: The Nature and Function of Embalming in Rome.
